description: Arsenal: Have your say on Community Shield win
title: Arsenal: Have your say on Community Shield win
title_page: Arsenal: Have your say on Community Shield win - BBC Sport
maintext:
Arsenal beat Manchester City in a penalty shootout to win the Community Shield at Wembley. The Gunners won the shootout 4-1 after the match had finished 1-1 at full-time.
What did you make of Arsenal's performance? Who stood out and what needs to improve?
